Wisdom: مَنْ سَكَنَ قَلْبَهُ الْعِلْمُ بِاللَّهِ سَكَنَهُ الْغِنَى عَنْ خَلْقِ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: Whoever keeps knowledge about Allah in his heart has accommodated independence from the creation of Allah in it

Wisdom: مَنْ عَدِمَ الْفَهْمَ عَنِ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ لَمْ يَنْتَفِعْ بِمَوْعِظَةِ وَاعِظٍ
enWisdom: One who is not granted understanding by Allah, the Glorified, does not benefit from the advice of any adviser

Wisdom: مَنْ عَرَفَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ لَمْ يَشْقَ أَبَداً
enWisdom: One who is cognizant of Allah, the Glorified, will never become wretched
One who believes in Allah [and attests to His oneness] is saved

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ عَرَفَ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ أَنْ يَرْغَبَ فِيمَا لَدَيْهِ
enWisdom: It behoves the one who knows Allah, the Glorified, to desire that which is with Him
Longing [for Allah and the Hereafter] is from the qualities of those who have certitude
Longing [for Allah] is the intimate companion of the Gnostics
